main_tasks:
• Define an AI project by translating business issues in manufacturing into mathematical problems AI researchers can understand.
• Plan a project with cost analysis, essential tasks, milestones, and success criteria.
• Manage project members from multifunctional teams to deliver the project's goal in time.
• Communicate with various stakeholders and customers at global sites.
• Write technical documents for regular project reviews and business meetings.
• Define business requirements to create software specifications and architecture.
• Work unsupervised and drive complex programs successfully.
requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in engineering
• +3 years of industrial experience in project management for manufacturing, software development, machine learning, or related field.
• Working knowledge in machine learning, data engineering, software development, cloud, ML DevOps. or computer vision.
• Excellent technical writing and presentation skills in both Korean and English.
jd:
As an AI Program Manager, you will lead AI projects to build reliable, robust, and scalable AI technology for the most challenging and fundamental problems the industry faces. You will support Gauss Labs' mission to be the world's most trusted industrial AI innovator. If you are the ideal candidate, you must possess a strong project management background with experience building relationships with external business partners. The candidate should identify business opportunities in customers' factories where Gauss Labs' AI solutions can help improve manufacturing productivity and efficiency. To overcome business and technical challenges, you have to plan the AI project strategically and manage the team to deliver outstanding performance. You will be required to professionally report the result to various stakeholders at global sites, including Gauss Labs' executives and customers.


주요업무
• Define an AI project by translating business issues in manufacturing into mathematical problems AI researchers can understand.
• Plan a project with cost analysis, essential tasks, milestones, and success criteria.
• Manage project members from multifunctional teams to deliver the project's goal in time.
• Communicate with various stakeholders and customers at global sites.
• Write technical documents for regular project reviews and business meetings.
• Define business requirements to create software specifications and architecture.
• Work unsupervised and drive complex programs successfully.

자격요건
• Bachelor's degree in engineering
• +3 years of industrial experience in project management for manufacturing, software development, machine learning, or related field.
• Working knowledge in machine learning, data engineering, software development, cloud, ML DevOps. or computer vision.
• Excellent technical writing and presentation skills in both Korean and English.

우대사항
• Master's or Ph.D. degree in engineering.
• +5 years of industrial experience in AI project management related to process control, metrology, equipment, or data analysis in semiconductor, display, or battery manufacturing.

혜택 및 복지
가우스랩스는 Gaussian의 지속적인 성장을 응원합니다. 
• 자기계발비 연 200만원 지급.
• 온/오프라인 교육, 세미나 무제한 지원.
• Books of the Months: 선정된 도서 전원 지급, 누구나/어떤 분야든 제안 가능.

가우스랩스는 Gaussian의 건강한 삶을 지원합니다.
• 인당 50만원 상당의 건강검진 지원 (본인 포함 총 2인까지).
• 본인 외 가족구성원 포함 단체상해보험 가입. 
• 휴양지 임직원 할인. 

가우스랩스는 Gaussian의 쾌적한 업무 환경을 마련합니다.
• 신뢰에 기반한 재량근로제. 가장 좋은 성과를 낼 수 있다면 시간과 장소는 자유! 
• 업무 최적 장비 구비.
• 식비, 교통비 및 통신비(직무에 따라) 지원.

더 좋은 복지를 위해 가우스랩스는 계속 변화중입니다.
